name: fetch_by_type_and_region
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool magical_taske.
Tool description: Fetch sceneries and getaways in Kenya.
API description: You can make a request finer by combining region and type. This endpoint will return the records requested. You have to provide a limit of the number of records you want.

type.description: The type of records to fetch. Refer to the README for accepted types.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to fetch.

region.description: The region from which to fetch records.
